title: Error publishing Teku artifacts to Cloudsmith
body:
Started failing in the past few hours:

https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/ConsenSys/teku/24971/workflows/951ff741-b373-477f-8199-58beb83af48c/jobs/182025

<details>
  <summary>Full error log</summary>
  
  ```
Picked up JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS: -Xmx1500m
To honour the JVM settings for this build a single-use Daemon process will be forked. See https://docs.gradle.org/8.1/userguide/gradle_daemon.html#sec:disabling_the_daemon.
Daemon will be stopped at the end of the build 
Configuration on demand is an incubating feature.
```

Hey Lucas - Lee from Cloudsmith here.

Looks like this was due to a third-party library breakage (we specify dependencies fairly loosely). We released a new version of the CLI (0.37.1) that is more strict for the broken dependency, so it should work again now. The release was only a few days ago: https://github.com/urllib3/urllib3/releases/tag/2.0.0 - Let us know if you're in a better state now. :)
